2024 年 4 月 16 日星期二 04:03:01 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
为什么你要让父母失望？德西丽·阿卡万德西丽·阿卡万When filmmaker Desiree Akhavan told her Iranian immigrant parents she was in love with a woman, she knew they would object. She explains why it's worth the risk to let people get to know the real you.为什么你要让父母失望？德西丽·阿卡万When filmmaker Desiree Akhavan told her Iranian immigrant parents she was in love with a woman, she knew they would object. 大麻可以帮助睡眠吗？这就是科学 |珍·沃尔什珍·沃尔什Can cannabis actually treat insomnia? It's complicated, says sleep physiologist Jen Walsh. While the plant has been used across time and cultures, there's been little scientific research on how it impacts sleep disorders like insomnia. That's precisely where she and her team come in. Learn about the world's first study into the potential of medicinal cannabis as a safe, accessible treatment to help us all rest easy.大麻可以帮助睡眠吗？这就是科学 |珍·沃尔什Can cannabis actually treat insomnia? It's complicated, says sleep physiologist Jen Walsh. While the plant has been used across time and cultures, there's been little scientific research on how it impacts sleep disorders like insomnia. That's precisely where she and her team come in. Learn about the world's first study into the potential of medicinal cannabis as a safe, accessible treatment to help us all rest easy. https://www.ted.com/talks/jen_walsh_can_cannabis_help_you_sleep_here_s_the_science?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127365 127365 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 14:43:46 +0000高等教育不00:11:27泰德
开垦原住民土地的新国家公园 |特蕾西·雷维斯特蕾西·雷维斯In a part of the United States with more than 17,000 years of human history, cultural preservation advocate Tracie Revis is working to turn the Ocmulgee Mounds into Georgia's first national park and preserve. This park would be co-managed by the Muscogee (Creek) Nation, bringing the tribal voice back to an area they were forcibly removed from 200 years ago. Revis explores the complex feelings of caring for this land and shows how it's fostering healing in return.开垦原住民土地的新国家公园 |特蕾西·雷维斯In a part of the United States with more than 17,000 years of human history, cultural preservation advocate Tracie Revis is working to turn the Ocmulgee Mounds into Georgia's first national park and preserve. This park would be co-managed by the Muscogee (Creek) Nation, bringing the tribal voice back to an area they were forcibly removed from 200 years ago. Revis explores the complex feelings of caring for this land and shows how it's fostering healing in return. https://www.ted.com/talks/tracie_revis_a_new_national_park_to_reclaim_indigenous_land?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:121120 121120 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 14:50:31 +0000高等教育不00:06:59泰德
想法改变一切——TED 的下一步是什么？克里斯·安德森和莫尼克·拉夫·贝尔克里斯·安德森和莫尼克·拉夫·贝尔TED is on a mission to discover and champion the ideas that will shape tomorrow. Reflecting on the evolution of that mission, TED's Chris Anderson and Monique Ruff-Bell cast a visionary gaze on the organization's future — including a revamped tagline, a renewed emphasis on debate and the launch of an exciting new conference — and explore the indispensable role of ideas in navigating societal challenges and fostering global innovation. Learn more about TED's enduring legacy, its path forward for the decades ahead and how you can join us in sparking a brighter future.想法改变一切——TED 的下一步是什么？克里斯·安德森和莫尼克·拉夫·贝尔TED is on a mission to discover and champion the ideas that will shape tomorrow. Reflecting on the evolution of that mission, TED's Chris Anderson and Monique Ruff-Bell cast a visionary gaze on the organization's future — including a revamped tagline, a renewed emphasis on debate and the launch of an exciting new conference — and explore the indispensable role of ideas in navigating societal challenges and fostering global innovation. Learn more about TED's enduring legacy, its path forward for the decades ahead and how you can join us in sparking a brighter future. https://www.ted.com/talks/chris_anderson_and_monique_ruff_bell_ideas_change_everything_and_what_s_next_for_ted?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127922 127922 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 14:40:55 +0000高等教育不00:20:38泰德
AI能在海上抓捕罪犯吗？ |迪希亚·贝尔哈比卜迪希亚·贝尔哈比卜Can AI help catch oceanic outlaws? From drug smugglers to modern-day pirates, maritime crime fighter Dyhia Belhabib introduces Heva: an AI-powered tool that aggregates international criminal records to detect and stop crime that might otherwise get swept away in the tide. 如何识别邪教组织 |萨拉·埃德蒙森萨拉·埃德蒙森Nobody joins a cult on purpose, says Sarah Edmondson, a former member of the infamous Nxivm cult and one of the three whistleblowers that led to its downfall. She explains how she got ensnared in this highly manipulative group — and then escaped it — and shares red flags to help you distinguish between a cult and a safe community.如何识别邪教组织 |萨拉·埃德蒙森Nobody joins a cult on purpose, says Sarah Edmondson, a former member of the infamous Nxivm cult and one of the three whistleblowers that led to its downfall. 想在商业上取得成功吗？找到需要解决的问题 |安东尼·谭 (Anthony Tan) 和阿曼·丹诺尼 (Amane Dannouni)安东尼·谭 (Anthony Tan) 和阿曼·丹诺尼 (Amane Dannouni) Anthony Tan — the CEO of Grab, Southeast Asia's leading super-app — talks about launching a business that not only turns a profit but also helps people and the environment. 中年时性会发生什么？看看“卧室间隙”|玛丽亚·索福克勒斯玛丽亚·索福克勒斯Menopause isn't just hot flashes, says gynecologist and sexual medicine specialist Maria Sophocles. It's often accompanied by overlooked symptoms like painful sex or loss of libido. Shedding light on what she calls the "bedroom gap," or the difference in sexual expectations of men and women in midlife due to societal norms, Sophocles advocates for education, medical advancement and a new understanding of menopause — because sex should be pleasurable and comfortable for everyone.中年时性会发生什么？看看“卧室间隙”|玛丽亚·索福克勒斯Menopause isn't just hot flashes, says gynecologist and sexual medicine specialist Maria Sophocles. It's often accompanied by overlooked symptoms like painful sex or loss of libido. Shedding light on what she calls the "bedroom gap," or the difference in sexual expectations of men and women in midlife due to societal norms, Sophocles advocates for education, medical advancement and a new understanding of menopause — because sex should be pleasurable and comfortable for everyone. https://www.ted.com/talks/maria_sophocles_what_happens_to_sex_in_midlife_a_look_at_the_bedroom_gap?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127715 127715 Tue, 02 Apr 2024 14:50:04 +0000高等教育不00:14:11泰德
一位喜剧演员讲述如何拯救民主 |乔丹·克莱珀乔丹·克莱珀Conversation is a battlefield with only one winner. Or is it?
